name: Name
title: Title
aml_description:
We specialize in providing Anti-Money Laundering (AML) services with particular expertise on Africa. We offer a full range of AML services to help businesses comply with anti-money laundering regulations. money laundering and the financing of terrorism.
Our team of AML experts has deep experience in building effective AML compliance programs tailored to different industries. We work with clients to identify AML risks specific to their business and industry. activity, then we develop customized strategies to minimize those risks.
platform_description:
Welcome to the Africa Verify ISAV platform, which will allow you to comply with the AML-FTP regulations following the “decision support” services for a compliant relationship with your customers, partners, suppliers, prospects, etc. . We are proud to offer a full range of compliance services to businesses, organizations, financial institutions...

The ISAV platform offers convenient access to all our services:

  • AML (Anti-Money Laundering), following risk-based approaches; “Legal and Regulatory”, “Reputational”, “Operational”, “Jurisdictional”; according to the levels of research and their regulations, namely:
  • KYE (Know Your Employee), 
  • KYB (Know Your Business), 
  • KYC (Know Your Customer), 
  • KYS (Know Your Supplier) …
  • Our AI “ISAV Scan” - Powerful Intelligent Reading Tool
  • Our certificate of good repute (conformity)
  • Our APIs (Application Programming Interface)
  • Our "AfricaDatacross" tool for exploiting data to fight against financial crime (identification of calls for tenders / companies selected and project owners)
  • Our Due Diligence services (Compliance reports on request)
  • Our Compliance Codes (supranational laws and regulations as well as each country in Africa, GCC countries, MENAFATF countries...
  • Our COFACE Reviews and Scores
  • Our training services (ACAMS - PECB - LBC-FTP training, etc.)
  • The CRA tool Dedicated to Legal professionals - Score - getting in touch
  • Our 54 platforms dedicated to the 54 African countries (Who Does What and Who Is Who?) Trombino “Country”...
  • The African Club for Chief Compliance Officers (ACCCO)

As a compliance leader in Africa, we are committed to helping our clients comply with applicable regulations, prevent criminal activity and protect their reputation. Our services are designed to help companies minimize risks, anticipate them and improve their compliance performance.

Our team of professionals is made up of compliance experts, lawyers and data analysts who have in-depth knowledge of the applicable regulations.
We invite you to explore the menu of our ISAV platform to discover the specificities of the services we offer. If you have any questions or need help deciding which services are right for your business, please don't hesitate to contact us. We are here to help you.
regulatory_legal_risks_description: This service allows you to check the legal and regulatory risks related to the people and entities involved in financial transactions. The information provided by the service includes principal sanctions, politically exposed persons (PEPs), influential persons and beneficial owners; a graph always available to visualize the links between the different entities. This information helps companies to comply with the regulations in force and to minimize the mandatory risks associated with financial transactions (The FATF Recommendations).
operational_risks_description: This service allows you to detect and assess the potential risks related to your activities. The information provided, such as management information, international economic data, official bulletins and reports from the Court of Auditors, allows companies to make informed decisions to comply with regulations and prevent criminal activities. Access to this additional information, as well as documents to download, strengthens the ability of companies to effectively manage their operational risk.
reputational_risks_description: This service allows you to protect your company's reputation by identifying and assessing the risks that could harm your image. The information included in this service such as additional sanctions, watchlists, leaks & papers lists, wanted lists, court decisions, sources of investigation, domiciliation/offshore, graph, media (anticipation) and web, allow comprehensive monitoring of corporate reputational risks. Additionally, it can help companies make informed decisions on compliance and due diligence.
others_description: We offer you additional documents such as: organizational charts that allow you to better situate the people of interest by visualizing the hierarchical structure of the company or organization. This facilitates the identification of stakeholders and their role in financial transactions. In addition, it helps to detect relationships of influence or control, which can be important indicators of potential risks related to money laundering or terrorist financing. video media (for example an interview) which allow you to get to know the person you are interested in better. This visual information provides additional information about the person, including the way they speak, their build and their voice, which can help establish a more precise identification and strengthen the reliability of the verification. Additionally, it can help assess the credibility and integrity of the person being verified. other documents of interest
media_description: We monitor real-time news and media releases about your business or an individual. This enables early detection of negative information or reputational risks, allowing companies to react quickly to limit negative impacts on their brand image. Moreover, this monitoring also helps to identify potential sources of threats and take preventive measures to avoid future attacks.
